name: GrannyMaster
0:
”Alexa start Granny Master”
”Alexa Open Granny Master”
”Alexa Repeat”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: granny master
des:
At GrannyMaster, we believe that everyone should have access to the courses they wish to learn and learn those courses from the people who can teach them in the best possible manner, while still keeping the cost of learning affordable.

We understand that everyone is not lucky enough to learn from the best teachers out there. However, by enabling teachers to develop content based on years of their teaching experience, we offer curated course content that is both comprehensive and comprehensible. In the process, we reward the teachers for their efforts and contributions to GrannyMaster.

Our vision is to provide a platform that can bridge the gap between the student and the teacher. By democratizing the learning process, we aspire to bring students and teachers closer, firstly by helping students to learn from the teachers they admire, and by facilitating teachers to reach out to a much larger student base. The best courses stand out from the rest because the courses are developed by members of GrannyMaster, for use by other members of the community, and are reviewed and rated by the community members in a truly unbiased environment.

If you are looking for some help with your course, GrannyMaster is the platform for you! And if you know a student who could benefit from GrannyMaster or a teacher who could be an asset to the platform, please let them know. Please spread the word and join us in our mission to make students and teachers happy!
